snippet: The New York City police detective, who was off duty during the episode last month, was seen on video pounding his fists into the back of the vehicle.
abstract: Wojciech Braszczok, off-duty undercover New York City police detective who was among motorcyclists chasing a sport utility vehicle from the Henry Hudson Parkway onto a Washington Heights street is arrested for his role in episode; Braszczok has said he left once riders began attacking the vehicle but his story is contradicted by video taken at scene as well as by eyewitnesses who say he was seen pounding his fists on back of vehicle.
lead_paragraph: The New York City police detective, who was off duty during the episode last month, was seen on video pounding his fists into the back of the vehicle.

headline.main: Undercover Detective Is Arrested in Attack on S.U.V.
headline.print_headline: Detective Is Arrested In Attack On S.U.V.
